channel.title: Smite bug showing ritualist instead of CL
channel.description:
#### What happened? Smited CL, CL showed up as ritualist instead of CL (he was a converted phys)
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? CL showing up as CL when smited
#### Steps to reproduce: Convert turned CL tries to convert someone and gets smited
#### Comments: There was a scorned ingame, might be a bug with scorned disguise. I asked the scorned to confirm or deny that he disguised the CL that night but he didn't answer
Output log: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/dnpnumslmmkdiq8/output_log%284%29.txt?dl=0)
Screenshots: [https://imgur.com/a/yCl14QG](https://imgur.com/a/yCl14QG)
